name: Black Sesame Oil(Made in Hong Kong) - 2 packs
description:
Description
Black sesame oil is an excellent edible oil with good food quality and high nutritional value. It is rich and not greasy, and can be eaten by men, women and children. It is especially suitable for postpartum women to nourish and strengthen the body.
It can be used as a salad, bacon, hot pot sauce or stir-fry soup. Put a few drops in the pan and add aroma to the food. It is the best choice for the whole family.

Made in Hong Kong
Product of Hong Kong

Our insistence:
Strictly select Thai high quality full black sesame seeds,
Made of pure natural cold pressing traditional method,
Preserve the rich nutrients of black sesame.
No preservatives and any additives.

Capacity: 250ml +- 10ml

description:

Restricted Food Permit No: 0398801056
Endorsements/Permission: Online Sale of Prepackaged Fresh, Chilled and Frozen Fish
Business Address: 5/F (PORTION) HKTV MULTIMEDIA AND ECOMMERCE CENTRE , NO.1 CHUN CHEONG STREET, TSUENG KWAN O INDUSTRIAL ESTATE, TSUENG KWAN O, NEW TERRITORIES, HONG KONG

summary:
Microware


  1. Open the bag and only remove the gasket on the grilled fish
  2. Do not need to thaw, microware at high temperature for 20 minutes
  3. Fully thawing, then microware for 10 minutes

Boiling


Full thawing and pour the fish and soup into the pot, cook at medium high heat for 8 minutes

name: Refill 80 pieces of sterile alcohol wet wipes (bucket)
description:
WARNING： 

*Do not eat.    

*Keep out of reach of children.                                   

*Avoid contact with eyes. lmmediately flush eyes with water upon contact.

*Do not use if skin wounds eczema, redness and abnormal etc .

*If redness, swelling, itching and irritation or infection occurs, discontinue using and consult physician.

*If sensitive skin person, skin sensitive test is advisable before use.

*store in a cool dry place.

*Keep away from fire.

The product packaging pictures are for reference only, the old and new/special version packaging will be shipped randomly. 

Original Japanese parallel imported genuine products.

The pictures are for reference only, and everything is subject to the actual product.

deliveryOrReturnPolicy:
• The item is shipped free of charge within 14-17 days of purchase.

• Free shipping does not include remote areas and outlying islands: Tung Chung plus $150, Ma Wan plus $150, Discovery Bay plus $350). For other regions, outlying islands and village houses, please check with the merchant for additional quotation.

• If the delivery address does not have a lift, the bed cannot enter the lift or the elevator is reached by stairs, an additional fee will be charged. Levels 1 to 4 add $70 per floor, and 5 or more layers add $100 per floor.

• If the truck is not directly accessible, a toll will be charged. The first 50 meters is free, then $80 for every 50 meters, and 50 meters for less than 50 meters.

• If you need to change the delivery date, you must submit it 3 days before the delivery date. If the transportation is rescheduled without notice and the delivery is made on the date of the appointment, the guest will be charged an additional fee of $100 per trip.

• Any errors or omissions in the information such as contact and address may result in delays in delivery.

• Disposal of mattress service. Please check with the merchant for additional quotation.

• Delivery time is from Monday to Saturday (no delivery on Sundays and public holidays).

storeDescription:
【特別通知】
有限度派送 請耐心等待

香港第五波新冠疫情嚴峻，隨著疫情進一步加劇，倉庫及辦工室人員減少，令訂單處理進度有所延誤。面對疫情下的不可控因素，小店仍會繼續竭力處理訂單，非常感謝客戶的體諒和支持。

有關商戶派送訂單，派送時效或會因應倉庫人手減少及快遞公司政策變更，而需時較長，望各位客戶見諒解。

小店對各位客戶的支持及體諒致萬分感謝！


農歷新年送貨服務

商戶派送之特別安排:
由2022年01月25日起暫停發貨，將於2022年 02月08 日後陸續恢復正常發貨。

CNY Delivery services Arrangement:
Delivery Service will be suspended from 25 Jan, 2022; and will resume normal from 08 Feb, 2022.


關於尺寸:
所有測量為人工測量，存在1-5cm誤差，介意慎選
​About size:
All measurements are manual measurements, there is an error of 1-5cm, please choose carefully

 

圖片只供參考。商品顏色或會因顯示器螢幕設定有所不同，商品圖案或會因剪裁時有少許差異，一切以實物為準。

有關傢俬類產品

The picture is for reference only. The color of the product may be different due to the setting of the monitor screen, and the pattern of the product may be slightly different due to the cutting. All the actual products shall prevail.


如需按個別要求更改顏色、尺寸、安裝方式、安裝方向等，請於下單後 24小時內Whatsapp 聯絡本店客服

About furniture products
If you need to change the color, size, installation method, installation direction, etc. according to individual requirements, please contact our customer service by Whatsapp within 24hours after placing the order
 

有關安裝︰

除產品有註明外，標價不含安裝費，如需要安裝服務，可聯絡客服提供安裝報價。

About installation:

Unless the product is specified, the price does not include installation fees. If you need installation services, you can contact customer service to provide an installation quotation.

Made from 100% natural bamboo fibers
Highly concentrated in Hyaluronic Acid to lock in moisture

Benefits:

  1. 33cm X 100cm, in roll, can be cut freely for different size of the wrapped food
  2. Save cost and can be used repeatedly and sustainably 
  3. Environmentally friendly cloth made out of certified organic and sustainable materials, protects the Earth 
  4. The cloth keeps the food fresher and healthier than the plastic alternative
  5. Have fun with the cloth by shaping and wrapping it in different ways

Instructions:

  1. Take out the beeswax cloth
  2. Fold it in different ways so that it can hold your food or water  以不同的方式折疊它，以便它可以容納您的食物或水
  3. Put your food into the cloth and roll the cloth where it’s open
  4. Wash the cloth after use
summary: Tired of wasting all that plastic after storing your food? Don’t worry, we have an alternative just for you. Try out our Beeswax Wraps, they are made out of certified organic cotton with sustainably sourced beeswax. For all you design lovers, our wraps aren’t bland, they come in a honey and bear themed design so that your wraps look stylish and lively too!

name: Biorepair Grape Junior Toothpaste
description:
Toning and astringent properties for gums

with microRepair® that strengthens and protects the thin enamel of children's teeth

·       Clinically tested

·       Fluoride free

·       Safe for children

Biorepair® kids toothpaste protects from cavity and it is ideal for oral hygiene from the first baby tooth. The enamel of children’s teeth is more subtle and vulnerable than adults enamel. Remineralizing it is important to defend it from attacks of sugar acids. Biorepair® Kids is the only one that contains microRepair® which strengthen the enamel of deciduous teeth favoring a healthy and correct development of permanent teeth. Its effectiveness is clinically tested. The formula is delicate, fruity and contains grape extract with toning and astringent properties for gums.

The formula is gentle with a fruity flavour and contains strawberry extract that tones and nourishes the gums. Its efficacy has been clinically tested, making it safe for children.

Calling all mums, your kid’s teeth are very delicate!
Here’s what you've got to do to protect them from cavities and other problems:

2.       Always use a toothbrush suitable for children’s teeth

3.       Don’t go overboard with very acidic drinks (for example, tea, fizzy drinks, fruit juices...)

4.       Don’t let them eat too much sugar and avoid too many sweets

Biorepair does NOT contain:

2.       Abrasive Silica

3.       Titanium Dioxide

4.       Parabens

5.       Sodium Lauryl Sulfate

6.       Dyes
summary:
Toning and astringent properties for gums

with microRepair® that strengthens and protects the thin enamel of children's teeth

·       Clinically tested

·       Fluoride free

·       Safe for children

Our store will protect your personal Information in accordance with the relevant
provisions of the Personal Data (Privacy) Ordinance and in accordance with HKTVmall Privacy Policies.
• In case of any dispute, the merchant will retain the right of final decision without
prior notice.
• Color shown may be slightly different than actual products due to computer
monitors settings.
• In situation where there are limitations, price, promotion offers and other
marketing campaigns on the HKTVmall may vary from retail stores, the terms and offers are only applicable to HKTVmall.
• Our refund policy gives customers a better shopping experience. From the day
you receive your item, our return policy is valid for 7 days. Item(s) purchased in our store may be returned and/or exchanged. Please visit Order History to view related order, then press "Return & refund" button to report the damaged products. Below situations are not acceptable in our refund policy:
1. Opened/used products
2. Without original and unopened packaging
3. Products with “non-returnable” remark
4. Free Gifts/ Accessories / Samples
5. Without the corresponding original order confirmation, delivery note
We will check before return/exchange, the original delivery charge and cost of
return are borne by customers. Customers must return with all free gifts/ accessories / samples.
